column4: HP CEO says split effective from November 1
column5: Hewlett-Packard Co Chief Executive Meg Whitman said the separation of HP Inc and Hewlett-Packard Enterprise would be effective on Nov. 1.

column4: RPT-Intel's purchase of Altera defends its datacenter dominance
column5: BANGALORE/SEATTLE  June 1 Intel Corp's  $17 billion purchase of programmable chip maker Altera Corp  is a costly defensive move to ward off rivals in the prized datacenter business it dominates  analysts said on Monday.
